Package: com.android.build.gradle.api

[Java] Interface ApkVariantOutput

      • com.android.build.gradle.api.BaseVariantOutput
      • All Superinterfaces:
        VariantOutput, BaseVariantOutput

        A variant output for apk-generating variants.

        • Methods Summary

            Methods 
            Type Name and description
            ZipAlign createZipAlignTask(java.lang.String taskName, java.io.File inputFile, java.io.File outputFile)
            java.lang.String getFilter(FilterType filterType)
            Returns a filter value for a filter type if present on this variant or null otherwise.
            PackageApplication getPackageApplication()
            Returns the packaging task

            Returns the version code override.
            java.lang.String getVersionNameOverride()
            Returns the version name override.

            Returns the Zip align task.

            Sets the version code override.

            Sets the version name override.

        • Method Detail

          • @NonNull public ZipAlign createZipAlignTask(@NonNull java.lang.String taskName, @NonNull java.io.File inputFile, @NonNull java.io.File outputFile)

          • public java.lang.String getFilter(FilterType filterType)

            Returns a filter value for a filter type if present on this variant or null otherwise.

            Parameters:
            filterType - the type of the filter requested.
            Returns:
            the filter value.

          • @Nullable public PackageApplication getPackageApplication()

            Returns the packaging task

          • public int getVersionCodeOverride()

            Returns the version code override. If the value is -1, then the output will use the version code defined in the main merged flavors for this variant.

            Returns:
            the version code override.

          • public java.lang.String getVersionNameOverride()

            Returns the version name override. If the value is null, then the output will use the version name defined in the main merged flavors for this variant.

            Returns:
            the version name override.

          • @Nullable public ZipAlign getZipAlign()

            Returns the Zip align task.

          • public void setVersionCodeOverride(int versionCodeOverride)

            Sets the version code override. This version code will only affect this output. If the value is -1, then the output will use the version code defined in the main merged flavors for this variant.

            Parameters:
            versionCodeOverride - the version code override.

          • public void setVersionNameOverride(java.lang.String versionNameOverride)

            Sets the version name override. This version name will only affect this output. If the value is null, then the output will use the version name defined in the main merged flavors for this variant.

            Parameters:
            versionNameOverride - the version name override.
